attributes.action: Provide free COVID test for people that lives in UK that’s  travelling to UK
attributes.additional_details: Lot of people left UK because of the pandemic COVID 19 most of them want to come back but flights are really expensive and COVID tests too.
attributes.background: Provide free home kit tests for people can’t afford to pay £210 for home kit COVID test when travel to uk for work or go to residence

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to change testing arrangements for UK arrivals, but it's not clear if you want free tests to be offered to all UK citizens, or only those who cannot afford to pay £210. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Lower the price of the £210 COVID Home Test Kits for travellers entering the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575509
